tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wrestlers ( 
 wrestler_id serial PRIMARY KEY, 
 wrestler_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
 salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
 expiry_date DATE, 
 special_clauses TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE wrestlers (
    wrestler_id INT,
    wrestler_name VARCHAR(255),
    salary DECIMAL(10,2),
    expiry_date DATE,
    special_clauses TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id INT,
    wrestler_id INT,
    contract_date DATE,
    contract_length INT,
    contract_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    CONSTRAINT fk_wrestler_id FOREIGN KEY (wrestler_id) REFERENCES wrestlers(wrestler_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Wrestlers ( 
 wrestler_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 wrestler_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
 salary DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, 
 expiry_date DATE, 
 special_clauses TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE Contracts ( 
 contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 wrestler_id INT REFERENCES Wrestlers(wrestler_id), 
 start_date DATE NOT NULL, 
 end_date DATE NOT NULL, 
 CONSTRAINT fk_wrestler FOREIGN KEY (wrestler_id) REFERENCES Wrestlers(wrestler_id) 
)

CREATE TABLE Titles ( 
 title_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 title_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
 wrestler_id INT REFERENCES Wrestlers(wrestler_id), 
 CONSTRAINT fk_wrestler FOREIGN KEY (wrestler_id) REFERENCES Wrestlers(wrestler_id) 
)

CREATE TABLE WrestlerContracts (
    wrestler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wrestler_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    expiry_date DATE NOT NULL,
    special_clauses TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE WrestlerDetails (
    wrestler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    birth_date DATE,
    height DECIMAL(5, 2),
    weight DECIMAL(5, 2),
    hometown VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Wrestlers (
    wrestler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    salary DECIMAL,
    expiry_date DATE,
    special_clauses TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wrestler_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    salary DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_wrestler FOREIGN KEY (wrestler_id) REFERENCES Wrestlers(wrestler_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EventResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    title_id INT,
    winner_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_event FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(event_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_title FOREIGN KEY (title_id) REFERENCES Titles(title_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_winner FOREIGN KEY (winner_id) REFERENCES Wrestlers(wrestler_id)
);
